item.title: Artificial Intelligence in Games — Why Isn't It better?
item.description: Disclaimer: I did very little research (if any) on this. You should consider the following, my opinion, and not a well-thought-out answer to the question. With frequent new releases of huge games like Cyberpunk 2077 now commonplace, and with the computer games industry raking in huge profits, something you may be wondering is, why isn’t the artificial intelligence — the AI — in computer games, well, better? After all, is this not the age of machine learning and self-driving cars?
